items.title: Audit Hub v1
items.notes: Migrated from draft-peviews/genco/index.html and restyled to Admireworks navy and gold visual system.

items.title: Audit Presentation v1
items.notes: Migrated interactive slide deck from draft-peviews/genco/presentation/index.html with brand font and token alignment.

items.title: Homepage Redesign v1
items.notes: Migrated redesign from draft-peviews/genco/redesigns/homepage.html; updated links and mobile-safe behavior for 360px widths.

items.title: Product Boho v1
items.notes: Migrated redesign from draft-peviews/genco/redesigns/product-boho.html with centralized theme tokens and responsive overflow fixes.

items.title: Product WaterRack v1
items.notes: Migrated redesign from draft-peviews/genco/redesigns/product-waterrack.html with tokenized palette and updated path references.

items.title: Homepage v1
items.notes: Refined hero narrative and stronger CTA hierarchy for lead capture.

items.title: Product Detail Page v2
items.notes: Moved trust badges above the fold and simplified variant selection.

items.title: Checkout v1
items.notes: Single-column mobile-first checkout with fewer fields and clearer totals.

items.title: Homepage v2
items.notes: Introduced testimonial strip and appointment funnel above the fold.

items.title: Services Page v1
items.notes: Service cards now grouped by treatment goal with clearer pricing anchors.

items.title: Booking Flow v1
items.notes: Step-based booking flow with concise form labels and friction check points.
